items.summary: Update the global theme tokens used by the app to implement a light-blue (#87ceeb) and black palette, replacing the current warm/terracotta colors. Apply the change in the stylesheet that is actually imported by the app (frontend/src/index.css is imported by frontend/src/main.tsx).

Ensure dark mode also follows the light-blue (#87ceeb) and black direction by using a near-black background with #87ceeb accents and readable light foreground text, while preserving existing theme toggle behavior.
